title: Kled "Moonwalk" Glitch
body:
I was playing {{champion:240}} Top recently, and noticed a bug with his E.

I tried to engage on their {{champion:157}} with my E+Q combo, but he Windwalled my Q. I still tagged him with my E, but I backed off after seeing the enemy jungler approaching. Instead of walking normally. Something weird happened.

While having the speed buff from my E, instead of running in the direction I was pointing to, I would go to the location, but stayed the same direction as when I E'd in the first place.

It's just a visual bug, but it looks really weird.

replies.body: A lot of champions have been able to moonwalk recently. Idk why but it's funny

Its repeatable on most dashes when recording through your replays. Speaking of kled bugs, please like my post so kled can get fixed :)

https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/UuQt1E5u-about-those-kled-bugs-i-reported
